content: John Jennings is a lecturer in Immersive and Cloud Computing. His research interests include the use of machine learning techniques in supporting teaching and learning in synchronous VR-based learning environments. He also has role of CTO in the Immersive Technology design and consultancy company Simvirtua.

title: John Jennings

title: Moodle Deployment

summary: Packaged a video-based eLearning course with Articulate Rise and deployed as SCORM packaged modules to multiple LMS's while serving video content cloud storage via a Content Delivery Network.
title: Articulate Cloud Deployment

title: Mobile App Design

title: Cloud Optimisation
